name: Luminous Labyrinth
description:
A maze solving puzzle game of high contrast colors and moving obstacles.

Free Demo also available below!


In a world made of labyrinths and colorful obstacles, move a glowing cube through beautiful worlds of color to find the ending star. Discover each colorful world, unlocking auras and hidden areas, all ending with an epic test of skill in Rainbow World.




• No time limit.
• No added quests.
• Simple move controls. (keyboard, mouse or game controller)
• ​Integrated menu system with minimal UI
• Original music by Matt Reeves




• Move thru labyrinths from 7 worlds of color.
• Discover all hidden areas and glowing stars to complete 100%.
• Use quick reaction time and patience to slide through each section.
• Collect a protective color aura to help against obstacles.
• Discover 100% on all levels of a world and unlock the permanent aura.
• Solve mazes in a high contrast, colorful world, while listening to an all original 8 song soundtrack.
